song_lyrics: Thāsho thāsho thāsho re, tame tedī ughāḍā thāsho re;
Lākho loko mānshe jyāre, ante to akaḷāsho re... °ṭek
Desh-pardesh ne gāmo gām, ghare ghare tame gavāsho re;
Ante to e karvu paḍshe, tyāre tame kyā jāsho re... Tame° 1
Kapaṭ te nahī chhānu re’vānu, kadī jo sogan khāsho re;
Harijanone dukhne ṭāṇe, dayā rākhīne dhāsho re... Tame° 2
Antveḷāe darshan daīne, prem sudhāras pāsho re;
Mahāpuruṣhnā antarmāhī, akhanḍ karasho vāso re... Tame° 3
title: Thāsho thāsho thāsho re tame tedī ughāḍā thāsho re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-106: Sadhu Mahapurushdas

Category: Shastriji Maharajna Pad
